name: Library Catalog
description: A local library catalog built in the MVC pattern using Node, Express, MongoDB, and Pug. Supports full CRUD functionality.

name: Weather App
description: A weather application that makes use of the OpenWeather API to fetch and display current and forecasted weather for any location.

name: To-do List
description: A clean, beautiful To-do List with an intuitive and responsive UI. Written in vanilla Javascript and styled from scratch in CSS.

name: Battleship
description: The game of Battleship implemented in JavaScript and tested with Jest. The enemy player makes smart decisions about which cells to attack.

name: Personal Library
description: An application that allows the user to maintain a personal library of books.

name: Benzinger.co
description: My personal website, built and designed from scratch with the help of React.js.

name: Etch-a-Sketch
description: A simple etch-a-sketch program written in JavaScript.

name: Calculator
description: A simple calculator in the neumorphism design style.
